Welcome to FeedMe - Customer
Before you get started please read the terms and conditions. As a customer I understand that it may take some time before someone accepts my request. As a customer I should not create fake orders, I should have the correct amount of funds to be able to pay for my order, I may not cancel my order once it is accepted, and I should not enter fake delivery information. On top of every order there will be a $5 dollar convenience fee/delivery charge added to your bill. To make sure that you apply by these conditions, and for the delivery's commitment to your order you will be charged a $10 security fee. This fee is to insure that there are no fake orders and all information is correct. Once upon payment the $10 will be refunded back to you.

CheckBox.android:text: I Accept the Terms and Conditions
